report:
=== AICCA COMPLIANCE REPORT ===
Policy: Sample Policy

PASS - Passwords must be at least 12 characters long.
PASS - MFA should be enabled for all admin accounts.
PASS - Access logs must be retained for 90 days.
PASS - Users should not share passwords.
PASS - Backup procedures are required weekly.
PASS - Encryption is required for sensitive data at rest.
PASS - Passwords must be rotated every 90 days.

Recommendations:
